channel.title: People these days
channel.description:
I just got back from the city with a group of people, because theres this festival thing called moomba on tonight. I personally saw around 8 fights, for no reason.
I have been in my share of fights, but they have all been for a reason. I dont understand why these fuckheads do it.

item.title: People these days
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:12, topic:385927”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=481684.msg3527601#msg3527601 date=1299955960]

I just got back from the city with a group of people, because theres this festival thing called moomba on tonight.
I personally saw around 8 fights, for no reason.

I have been in my share of fights, but they have all been for a reason.
I dont understand why these fuckheads do it.

You sound like a pussy, its called being a human being. If a human body wasn’t ment to make damage. Then why do we bruse etc.
We’re ment to fight sometimes, and when I have a drink, its fun to have a fight, be human- its not a crime.

So what you’re saying is, a human should follow their natural instinct and fight whenever they feel like fighting because the body is able to heal?
[/quote]

thats right[/quote]

xxlukexx:

The world is fucked.

Like two peas in a pod.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Rash, post:16, topic:385927”][quote author=Kaex link=topic=481684.msg3527600#msg3527600 date=1299955787]

We’re ment to fight sometimes, and when I have a drink, its fun to have a fight, be human- its not a crime.
[/quote]

I sound like a pussy?
Im sorry for not hitting people for no fucking reason.
Your telling me, if 7 or 8 guys came up to you, and belted the shit out of you, you would be fine with it?
Stop trying to look like some fucking cool kid, when all you are is a keyboard warrior.[/quote]You’re both pussies. Shut up.

item.title: People these days
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:6, topic:385927”]I attempt not to fight, I take a lot of bullshit (not because I’m weak) because I learned once that when I did fight. I ended up not stopping, and put the person in the hospital. Therefore over time, I’ve learned to deal with anger and how to control it.

I would fight someone if those limits where pushed.[/quote]

I get like, that when I fight, but my mates know when to stop me.

[quote=“k0 twin, post:7, topic:385927”]Maybe they all had just watched Fight Club

<3 that movie[/quote]
It is pre good

Read full topic

item.title: People these days
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I attempt not to fight, I take a lot of bullshit (not because I’m weak) because I learned once that when I did fight. I ended up not stopping, and put the person in the hospital. Therefore over time, I’ve learned to deal with anger and how to control it.

I would fight someone if those limits where pushed.

Read full topic

item.title: People these days
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:4, topic:385927”][quote author=Rash link=topic=481684.msg3527358#msg3527358 date=1299939058]

haha, just like my school… Asian who do it mostly to either other asians or whites for no reason.
IDK why but they think they are bad, yet they are fucked in the brain.

The world is fucked.

Im not trying to sound tough, or pur anyone who uses this site down, but Im not the sterotypical “computer geek”
I kick it with “gangsters” and all that bullshit, and I end up fighting, but theres always a reason.
I just dont understand these fuckheads.
They pick on people littler or in smaller groups.
Noone even second looked me and the people I was with, because there was like 15 of us, and were all big.
I hate people like that,
[/quote]

If theres a reason, then thats fine… I fight if there is a reason to fight the person but otherwise i don’t even think about it.
People who just come up to you and punch you (You have those faggots at times. Mainly in school), I just punch them back.

And where do you live? Im in UK and the only time i see people fighting are at night when there drunk.[/quote]

Im inmelbourne, australia.
We have alot of street violence here

Read full topic
